directions: Mince garlic, then mash to a paste with 3/4 teaspoon salt.
Whisk together garlic paste, pepper, lemon zest and juice, vinegar, and mustard, then whisk in oil until emulsified.
ingredients: 1 1/2 to 2 tablespoons coarsely ground black pepper
1/4 cup chopped fresh tarragon or basil (optional)
title: Lemon Pepper Garlic Vinaigrette
